entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is about to enter the Pensieve with Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and experienced wizard who is guiding Harry through the Pensieve.

entities.name: bob ogden
entities.description: A former employee of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement whose memories are being accessed by Dumbledore and Harry.

relationships.description: Harry is accompanying Dumbledore into the Pensieve to access Bob Ogden's memories.
Dumbledore persuaded Bob Ogden to confide his recollections to him before he died.
